name: Building 21 Virtual Open House
description:
This game was created as part of a summer research project at McGill's Building 21: "Foundations of a Better World". The game is intended to showcase the spirit of the project and share some of the student's reflections on their project.

For more information: https://building21.ca/summer-2022

Credits

Made by Darius Valevicius

Content by Viola Ruzzier, Nakiya Noorbhai, Yunjie Zhang, Wei Xu, Zuirui Li, Emile Chamberland, Josh Weinstein, Sumali Mehta

Free assets by TriForge Assets, Render Knight, Nobiax, Alexander E Smith, gykseruy, bronwenalexina

Soundscape by Emile Chamberland

Music by BenSound.com
